post.text: Si Trump insiste que lo que él dijo sobre las mujeres es "charla de vestidor", es evidente que no está arrepentido.

comment.author: Eric
comment.text: He has apologized. You have never apologized for Benghazi.

replies.author: Connor
replies.text: What difference, at this point, does it make?

replies.author: Eric
replies.text: Wonder if she'd say the same if she went to jail?
